span.span: An can support multiple readers concurrently, as long as the collection is not modified.

threadsafe.span: 若要保證的執行緒安全，所有作業都必須都透過包裝函式所傳回方法。

span.span: To guarantee the thread safety of the , all operations must be done through the wrapper returned by the method.

threadsafe.span: 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。

span.span: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.

threadsafe.span: 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。

span.span: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.

threadsafe.span: 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。

span.span: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不會複製的內容。 does not copy the contents of . 相反地，它只會建立包裝函式; 因此，若要變更也會影響。Instead, it only creates an wrapper around ; therefore, changes to the also affect the . 泛型類別會提供，和方法。The class provides generic , and methods. 這個包裝函式可以使用這些方法的方法; 不過，執行這些一般的作業，透過包裝函式可能比直接在套用作業的效率較差。This wrapper can be a means to use those methods on ; however, performing these generic operations through the wrapper might be less efficient than operations applied directly on the . 這個方法是 o （1） 作業。This method is an O(1) operation. ## 版本相容性Version Compatibility .NET Framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中呼叫上的方法多載包裝函式會傳回處理第二個引數，上限為而不是計數的列舉值。In the .NET Framework version 1.0 and 1.1, calling the method overload on the wrapper returned an enumerator that treated the second argument as an upper bound rather than as a count. 在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]第二個引數正確視為計數。In the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] the second argument is correctly treated as a count.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接受`null`做為有效的值，並允許重複的項目。 accepts `null` as a valid value and allows duplicate elements. 中的項目順序會保留在。The order of the elements in the is preserved in the . 如果新(目前再加上集合的大小) 將會大於，則容量的自動重新配置內部的陣列，以容納新的項目，會增加，加入新項目之前，現有的項目會複製到新陣列。If the new (the current plus the size of the collection) will be greater than , the capacity of the is increased by automatically reallocating the internal array to accommodate the new elements, and the existing elements are copied to the new array before the new elements are added. 如果可以容納新的項目，而不會增加，這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是要加入的項目數。If the can accommodate the new elements without increasing the , this method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the number of elements to be added. 如果容量需要增加，以容納新的項目，這個方法會變成 O (`n` + `m`) 作業，其中`n`是要加入的項目數並`m`是。If the capacity needs to be increased to accommodate the new elements, this method becomes an O(`n` + `m`) operation, where `n` is the number of elements to be added and `m` is . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何加入項目來。The following code example shows how to add elements to the . remarks.format: ## Remarks `value`參數，每個項目的必須實作介面，用於比較。The `value` parameter and each element of the must implement the interface, which is used for comparisons. 項目必須已經以遞增的值，根據所定義的排序次序排序實作; 否則結果可能不正確。The elements of the must already be sorted in increasing value according to the sort order defined by the implementation; otherwise, the result might be incorrect. 比較`null`允許使用任何型別並不會產生例外狀況，當使用。Comparing `null` with any type is allowed and does not generate an exception when using . 排序時，`null`會被視為小於任何其他物件。When sorting, `null` is considered to be less than any other object. 如果只會包含一個以上的項目具有相同的值，此方法會傳回其中一個相符項目，而且它可能會傳回任何一個的相符項目中，而不一定是第一個。If the contains more than one element with the same value, the method returns only one of the occurrences, and it might return any one of the occurrences, not necessarily the first one. 如果不包含指定的值，方法會傳回負整數。If the does not contain the specified value, the method returns a negative integer. 您可以將位元補數運算 （~） 套用至這個負整數，以取得大於搜尋值的第一個元素的索引。You can apply the bitwise complement operation (~) to this negative integer to get the index of the first element that is larger than the search value. 當將值插入，此索引應做為插入點用來維護的排序次序。When inserting the value into the , this index should be used as the insertion point to maintain the sort order. 這個方法是 O (log `n`) 運算，其中`n`是。This method is an O(log `n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用找不到特定的物件中。The following code example shows how to use to locate a specific object in the . 否則結果可能不正確。The elements of the must already be sorted in increasing value according to the sort order defined by `comparer`; otherwise, the result might be incorrect. 如果`comparer`已`null`，比較完成使用實作提供項目本身，或指定的值。If `comparer` is `null`, the comparison is done using the implementation provided by the element itself or by the specified value. 項目必須已經以遞增的值，根據所定義的排序次序排序實作; 否則結果可能不正確。The elements of the must already be sorted in increasing value according to the sort order defined by the implementation; otherwise, the result might be incorrect. 比較`null`允許使用任何型別並不會產生例外狀況，當使用。Comparing `null` with any type is allowed and does not generate an exception when using . 排序時，`null`會被視為小於任何其他物件。When sorting, `null` is considered to be less than any other object. 如果只會包含一個以上的項目具有相同的值，此方法會傳回其中一個相符項目，而且它可能會傳回任何一個的相符項目中，而不一定是第一個。If the contains more than one element with the same value, the method returns only one of the occurrences, and it might return any one of the occurrences, not necessarily the first one. 如果不包含指定的值，方法會傳回負整數。If the does not contain the specified value, the method returns a negative integer. 您可以將位元補數運算 （~） 套用至這個負整數，以取得大於搜尋值的第一個元素的索引。You can apply the bitwise complement operation (~) to this negative integer to get the index of the first element that is larger than the search value. 當將值插入，此索引應做為插入點用來維護的排序次序。When inserting the value into the , this index should be used as the insertion point to maintain the sort order. 這個方法是 O (log `n`) 運算，其中`n`是。This method is an O(log `n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下列範例會建立彩色的動物。The following example creates an of colored animals. 提供執行二進位搜尋的字串比較。The provided performs the string comparison for the binary search. 反覆的搜尋和二進位搜尋的結果會顯示。The results of both an iterative search and a binary search are displayed. remarks.format: ## Remarks 比較子會自訂如何比較項目。The comparer customizes how the elements are compared. 例如，您可以使用作為要執行不區分大小寫的字串搜尋的比較子的執行個體。For example, you can use a instance as the comparer to perform case-insensitive string searches. 如果`comparer`提供的項目會指定使用指定的值比較實作。If `comparer` is provided, the elements of the are compared to the specified value using the specified implementation. 項目必須已經以遞增的值，根據所定義的排序次序排序`comparer`; 否則結果可能不正確。The elements of the must already be sorted in increasing value according to the sort order defined by `comparer`; otherwise, the result might be incorrect. 如果`comparer`已`null`，比較完成使用實作提供項目本身，或指定的值。If `comparer` is `null`, the comparison is done using the implementation provided by the element itself or by the specified value. 項目必須已經以遞增的值，根據所定義的排序次序排序實作; 否則結果可能不正確。The elements of the must already be sorted in increasing value according to the sort order defined by the implementation; otherwise, the result might be incorrect. 比較`null`允許使用任何型別並不會產生例外狀況，當使用。Comparing `null` with any type is allowed and does not generate an exception when using . 排序時，`null`會被視為小於任何其他物件。When sorting, `null` is considered to be less than any other object. 如果只會包含一個以上的項目具有相同的值，此方法會傳回其中一個相符項目，而且它可能會傳回任何一個的相符項目中，而不一定是第一個。If the contains more than one element with the same value, the method returns only one of the occurrences, and it might return any one of the occurrences, not necessarily the first one. 如果不包含指定的值，方法會傳回負整數。If the does not contain the specified value, the method returns a negative integer. 您可以將位元補數運算 （~） 套用至這個負整數，以取得大於搜尋值的第一個元素的索引。You can apply the bitwise complement operation (~) to this negative integer to get the index of the first element that is larger than the search value. 當將值插入，此索引應做為插入點用來維護的排序次序。When inserting the value into the , this index should be used as the insertion point to maintain the sort order. 這個方法是 O (log `n`) 運算，其中`n`是`count`。This method is an O(log `n`) operation, where `n` is `count`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks C# 語言的 `foreach` 陳述式 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `for each`) 會隱藏列舉值的複雜度。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建議您使用 `foreach`，而不要直接使用列舉值。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 列舉程式可以用來讀取集合中的資料，但是無法用來修改基礎集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 一開始，列舉程式位在集合中的第一個項目之前。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 也會將列舉值帶回至這個位置。 also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在這個位置上， 並未定義。At this position, is undefined. 因此，在讀取 的值之前，必須呼叫 以將列舉值前移至集合的第一個項目。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 會傳回相同的物件直到呼叫 或 。 returns the same object until either or is called. 會將 設定為下一個項目。 sets to the next element. 如果集合，也就是列舉值的結尾是否位於集合中的最後一個元素之後的階段和傳回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 列舉值位於此位置，後續呼叫也會傳回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果上次呼叫傳回`false`，是未定義。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 若要再次將 設定為集合的第一個元素，您可以在呼叫 之後，接著呼叫 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合維持不變，列舉程式就持續有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果對集合進行變更，例如加入、修改或刪除項目，列舉程式會永久失效，且其行為未定義。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined. 列舉程式沒有集合的獨佔存取權，因此，列舉集合內容本質上並不是安全的執行緒程序。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要確保列舉期間的執行緒安全性，您可以在整個列舉期間鎖定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要讓多重執行緒能夠存取集合以便進行讀取和寫入，您必須實作自己的同步處理。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 這個方法是 o （1） 作業。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下列範例會取得列舉值，和範圍中的項目列舉值。The following example gets the enumerator for an , and the enumerator for a range of elements in the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 接受`null`做為有效的值，並允許重複的項目。 accepts `null` as a valid value and allows duplicate elements. 如果已等於，則容量的會加上自動重新配置內部的陣列，並加入新項目之前，現有的項目會複製到新陣列。If already equals , the capacity of the is increased by automatically reallocating the internal array, and the existing elements are copied to the new array before the new element is added. 如果`index`等於，`value`新增至結尾。If `index` is equal to , `value` is added to the end of . 在連續項目的集合 (例如清單) 中，後面接著插入點的項目會向下移動以容納新項目。In collections of contiguous elements, such as lists, the elements that follow the insertion point move down to accommodate the new element. 如果集合具有索引，則移動之項目的索引也會更新。If the collection is indexed, the indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated. 集合的項目若在概念上群組成 Bucket (例如雜湊資料表)，則不適用這項行為。This behavior does not apply to collections where elements are conceptually grouped into buckets, such as a hash table. 這個方法是 O (`n`) 運算，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何將元素插入到。The following code example shows how to insert elements into the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 接受`null`做為有效的值，並允許重複的項目。 accepts `null` as a valid value and allows duplicate elements. 如果新(目前再加上集合的大小) 將會大於，則容量的自動重新配置內部的陣列，以容納新的項目，會增加，加入新項目之前，現有的項目會複製到新陣列。If the new (the current plus the size of the collection) will be greater than , the capacity of the is increased by automatically reallocating the internal array to accommodate the new elements, and the existing elements are copied to the new array before the new elements are added. 如果`index`等於，項目結尾加入。If `index` is equal to , the elements are added to the end of . 中的項目順序會保留在。The order of the elements in the is preserved in the . 在連續項目的集合 (例如清單) 中，後面接著插入點的項目會向下移動以容納新項目。In collections of contiguous elements, such as lists, the elements that follow the insertion point move down to accommodate the new element. 如果集合具有索引，則移動之項目的索引也會更新。If the collection is indexed, the indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated. 集合的項目若在概念上群組成 Bucket (例如雜湊資料表)，則不適用這項行為。This behavior does not apply to collections where elements are conceptually grouped into buckets, such as a hash table. 這個方法是 O (`n` + `m`) 作業，其中`n`是要加入的項目數並`m`是。This method is an O(`n` + `m`) operation, where `n` is the number of elements to be added and `m` is . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何將元素插入到。The following code example shows how to insert elements into the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 具有固定大小的集合不允許在集合建立後新增或移除項目，但允許對現有項目進行修改。A collection with a fixed size does not allow the addition or removal of elements after the collection is created, but it allows the modification of existing elements. 具有固定大小集合是唯讀的集合只會防止新增和移除項目; 的包裝函式因此，如果變更基礎的集合，包括新增或移除項目，固定大小的集合會反映這些變更。A collection with a fixed size is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents adding and removing elements; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, including the addition or removal of elements, the fixed-size collection reflects those changes. 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立的固定大小包裝。The following code example shows how to create a fixed-size wrapper around an . remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要保證的執行緒安全，所有作業都必須都透過包裝函式所傳回方法。To guarantee the thread safety of the , all operations must be done through the wrapper returned by the method. 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何鎖定集合使用在整個列舉期間。The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會使用，它會使用快速排序演算法。This method uses , which uses the QuickSort algorithm. 快速排序演算法是比較排序 （也稱為不穩定的排序），這表示 「 小於或等於 」 比較作業會判斷這兩個項目應該先出現在最終的已排序清單中。The QuickSort algorithm is a comparison sort (also called an unstable sort), which means that a "less than or equal to" comparison operation determines which of two elements should occur first in the final sorted list. 不過，如果兩個項目相等，可能不會保留其原始的順序。However, if two elements are equal, their original order might not be preserved. 相反地，穩定的排序會保留相等項目的順序。In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal. 若要執行的穩定排序，您必須實作自訂介面，以使用這個方法的其他多載。To perform a stable sort, you must implement a custom interface to use with the other overloads of this method. 平均而言，這個方法是 O (`n`記錄檔`n`) 運算，其中`n`是; 最壞的情況是 O (`n`^2) 作業。On average, this method is an O(`n` log `n`) operation, where `n` is ; in the worst case it is an O(`n`^2) operation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何排序值。The following code example shows how to sort the values in an . [!code-cpp[Classic ArrayList.Sort Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ArrayList.Sort Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ArrayList.Sort Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ArrayList.Sort Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ArrayList.Sort Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ArrayList.Sort Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，以使用自訂比較子實作排序的物件清單介面。Use the method to sort a list of objects with a custom comparer that implements the interface. 如果您傳遞`null`for `comparer`，這個方法會使用實作的每個項目。If you pass `null` for `comparer`, this method uses the implementation of each element. 在此情況下，您必須確定在清單中所包含的物件，實作介面或例外狀況會發生。In this case, you must make sure that the objects contained in the list implement the interface or an exception will occur. 此外，使用實作表示清單執行 （也稱為不穩定的排序） 比較排序; 也就是說，如果兩個項目相等，其順序可能不會保留。In addition, using the implementation means the list performs a comparison sort (also called an unstable sort); that is, if two elements are equal, their order might not be preserved. 相反地，穩定的排序會保留相等項目的順序。In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal. 若要執行的穩定排序，您必須實作自訂介面。To perform a stable sort, you must implement a custom interface. 平均而言，這個方法是 O (`n`記錄檔`n`) 運算，其中`n`是; 最壞的情況是 O (`n`^2) 作業。On average, this method is an O(`n` log `n`) operation, where `n` is ; in the worst case it is an O(`n`^2) operation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何排序值使用預設比較子和自訂比較子，會反轉排序次序。The following code example shows how to sort the values in an using the default comparer and a custom comparer that reverses the sort order. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`comparer`設為`null`，這個方法會執行 （也稱為不穩定的排序） 比較排序; 也就是說，如果兩個項目相等，其順序可能不會保留。If `comparer` is set to `null`, this method performs a comparison sort (also called an unstable sort); that is, if two elements are equal, their order might not be preserved. 相反地，穩定的排序會保留相等項目的順序。In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal. 若要執行的穩定排序，您必須實作自訂介面。To perform a stable sort, you must implement a custom interface. 平均而言，這個方法是 O (`n`記錄`n`) 運算，其中`n`是`count`; 最壞的情況是 O(n^2) 作業。On average, this method is an O(`n` log `n`) operation, where `n` is `count`; in the worst case it is an O(n^2) operation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何排序目的範圍中的值使用預設比較子和自訂比較子，會反轉排序次序。The following code example shows how to sort the values in a range of elements in an using the default comparer and a custom comparer that reverses the sort order. summary.span: 傳回已同步 (安全執行緒) 的 包裝函式。

span.span: Returns an wrapper that is synchronized (thread safe).

returns.span: 已同步 (安全執行緒) 的 包裝函式。

span.span: An wrapper that is synchronized (thread safe).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要保證的執行緒安全，所有作業都必須都透過此包裝函式。To guarantee the thread safety of the , all operations must be done through this wrapper. 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何鎖定集合使用在整個列舉期間。The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration. [!code-cpp[Classic ArrayList.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ArrayList.IsSynchronized Example/CPP/source2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic ArrayList.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ArrayList.IsSynchronized Example/CS/source2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic ArrayList.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ArrayList.IsSynchronized Example/VB/source2.vb#2)] 這個方法是 o （1） 作業。This method is an O(1) operation. 下列程式碼範例示範如何同步處理，判斷是否同步處理，並使用 同步處理。The following code example shows how to synchronize an , determine if an is synchronized and use a synchronized . remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要建立的同步處理的版本，使用方法。To create a synchronized version of the , use the method. 不過，在衍生的類別可以提供自己的同步處理的版本使用屬性。However, derived classes can provide their own synchronized version of the using the property. 同步處理的程式碼必須執行作業的中，不要直接依賴。The synchronizing code must perform operations on the of the , not directly on the . 如此可確保衍生自其他物件的集合可以正常運作，This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects. 具體來說，它會維護適當的同步處理的其他執行緒可能同時修改物件。Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the object. 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何鎖定集合使用在整個列舉期間。The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration.
